selectionObj.name: scrub by
selectionObj.desc: The amount (in beats) to scrub relative to the current Arrangement playback position. Same as jump_by , at the moment.

parameterObj.name: Beats
parameterObj.desc: A decimal number value in the format bars.beats.sixteenths.ticks. Example (4 bars): 004.00.00.000
